name: Pair of Gueridons
description: Pair of Gueridons; Attributed to André-Charles Boulle (French, 1642 - 1732, master before 1666); about 1680; Oak veneered with ebony, tortoise shell, blue painted horn, brass, and pewter, and set with gilt bronze mounts; 87.DA.5; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Pair of Gueridons
medium: Oak veneered with ebony, tortoise shell, blue painted horn, brass, and pewter, and set with gilt bronze mounts
